name: brick-mcp-app
description: A Three.js MCP App for designing 3D brick constructions

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && esbuild server.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/server.js --external:express --external:cors --external:@modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external:@modelcontextprotocol/ext-apps --external:zod && esbuild main.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --external:./server.js --external:express --external:cors --external:@modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external:@modelcontextprotocol/ext-apps --banner:js='#!/usr/bin/env node'
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run serve"
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run serve
